title: Full Metal Lulu
body: Lulu skin where she is in metal armor and has a red laser mask that covers her face kind of like project yasuo. pix is a small robot that follows her around. lulus auto attacks are red lasers. her q is 2 red lasers. her w is she turns people into either a robot squirrel or a bunch of metal. her e is she places pix on an ally. her ult is she makes a large metal ring around someone which quickly rise over them, making them bigger and knocking everyone up ;)
